name: Tong: Troll Pong
description:
A small project I did. Random power-ups, audio-cues that are of little to no help and a gravity well that changes the ball's trajectory. Also the balls speeds-up if every hit. Troll Pong if it wasn't clear. Also fun to play alone. Seriously.

Left paddle: W and S.

Right paddle: with Up and Down arrows.

Can be downloaded here:

http://www.shaykrainer.com/portfolio
